name: Action
purpose: Fast, kinetic, documentary-style scenes where motion is the hero. The image should feel mid-moment, not posed.

hero_focus: Motion at the heart: decks mid-shuffle, cards arcing through air, hands colliding in high-fives, mezcal pour moments.
Shallow depth of field: freeze ONE sharp element (card edge, pour stream, glass rim) with surrounding blur.
Crop tight to amplify momentum. Keep it intimate and close.

center_of_gravity: action occurs within the central 60 percent of frame
hero subject remains readable even in motion blur
do not stage like a catalogue product shot
background_behavior: suggestive environment textures (wood, zinc, bar top)

allowed_motion: cards arcing through air toward the table
hands grabbing or spinning a glass
motion_camera_effects: 1 sharp anchor with surrounding motion blur
subtle motion streaks on background hands only

preferred.label: Compact bar counter
preferred.notes: Tight surfaces, worn textures, intimate spacing.

preferred.label: Cluttered game table
preferred.notes: Chips, coasters, matchbooks, normal mess, not staged.

preferred.label: Loft table
preferred.notes: Urban, warm, low-lit, brick hints, wood or zinc surfaces.

preferred.label: Outdoor patio with string lights
preferred.notes: Warm ambience, handheld feel, tighter crop than normal.

framing_preferences: full faces allowed but not posed

preferred_angles.label: 45-degree table angle
preferred_angles.notes: Best for showing shuffle, hands, and tabletop momentum.

preferred_angles.label: Handheld close POV
preferred_angles.notes: Feels real and fast. Great for motion blur.

preferred_angles.label: Top-down flat lay
preferred_angles.notes: Only if there is obvious motion in hands or cards.

preferred_angles.label: Macro close-crop
preferred_angles.notes: Use for card edges, pour stream, glass rim, texture.

lens_language: focus locked on one sharp element
focus_targets_ranked: card edge or face artwork detail
framing_rules: keep product readable and true scale

preferred.label: Candle plus bar glow
preferred.notes: Small highlights, rich shadows, dramatic contrast.

shadow_notes: let blur catch light on moving hands

scale_locks: Playing cards must be true-to-size 2.5 inches by 3.5 inches.
The card must fit fully inside one adult hand.
Card height should be roughly similar to the mezcal glass height.
No oversized cards, no poster-sized props.
positioning: Product appears inside action, not staged as a hero placard.
Cards can be partially obscured by hands or glass, but must remain identifiable.
If using card back plus face card, keep them close and naturally aligned.

prompt_fragments.style_line: photorealistic, documentary realism, tactile textures, natural grain, shallow depth of field, one sharp anchor with surrounding motion blur
prompt_fragments.action_line: decks mid-shuffle with blurred edges, cards arcing through air, hands moving fast, cropped tight to amplify momentum
prompt_fragments.environment_line: worn tabletop surfaces, subtle clutter like coasters and matchbooks, intimate low-lit bar or game table energy

scene_moment_templates: Hands mid-shuffle as a single card snaps into focus
A card slides across the table mid-laugh, glasses clink
Cards arc through warm light, one edge razor sharp
Quick deal in motion, fingertips blur, card face crisp
A hand catches a card mid-air, table clutter vibrating
A glass spins slightly as cards scatter into a new round
Mid-pour pause, stream sharp, hands moving around it
High-five collision above the table, cards mid-pass below
props_notes: Avoid any prop that introduces readable text like menus or notebooks.
If a note card appears, it must be blank or blurred beyond readability.

discover.nudge: Make the action reveal something subtle about flavour or agave without showing readable writing.

play.nudge: Lean into banter and game energy, keep it social and cheeky, motion forward.

level_up.nudge: Show the action improving choices: card-guided sip or selection moment, still mid-motion.

hard_constraints_locked: no text overlays, no captions, no watermarks, no logos, no UI icons, no corner marks, no sparkles
no pristine studio staging, no glossy product-ad perfection, no sterile white backgrounds
no warped hands, no extra fingers
mezcal bottles must have blank or unbranded labels only
poured mezcal must be still liquid, never bubbly or fizzy
no readable text anywhere in the scene except on the reference card itself; all other writing must be blurred or illegible
mezcal glass must be a small clay copita or small tulip copita, not a tumbler or rocks glass

avoid_visuals: sterile clean tables with no life

good_output_signals: one sharp anchor element with surrounding blur
tight crop with hands in motion
